full_summary:
### 2022 Air Transportation Source Lists
#### Government Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking industry applications to renew its 2022 Air Transportation Source Lists. The existing lists expire on November 18, 2022, and subsequent transportation requirements will be issued to pre-qualified service providers and brokers.

### Source List Renewal
The DND invites service providers and brokers to submit applications under the following categories:

* **Air Passenger Full Charter:** Domestic and International
* **Air Cargo Full Charter:** Domestic and International
* **Air Helicopter Charters:** Domestic and International

Applicants must provide detailed information to support their application for each category. A separate application is required for each listing.

### Application Process
Applications will be reviewed immediately for those submitted by November 10, 2022, and successful applicants will be included in the relevant Source List, effective November 19, 2022. Late applications will be reviewed as time and resources permit, and added to the appropriate Source List for the remainder of the two-year validity period.

**Note:** The DND reserves the right to seek clarification from applicants, cancel the sourcing process, or reissue the solicitation.

### Evaluation Criteria
To be considered for inclusion in the Source Lists, applicants must demonstrate the financial means to manage high-value contracts and may be required to submit a performance bond or other forms of contract security.

### Point of Contact
Trevor Clark, DSPCOS 7-6-2, is the contact person for this solicitation.

### Submissions
Please submit your application electronically to TransportationContracting@forces.gc.ca. Attachments are provided below:

* [Air Passenger Full Charter Application - Annex A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/25490eb99baacd3616742a3a29c26a0a/annex_a_air_passenger_full_charter_application.docx)
* [Air Cargo Full Charter Application - Annex B](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/34ad2c8652b15cddb422beb34b30cc08/annex_c_air_helicopters_full_charter_application.docx)
